unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.title: Unofficial Monumenta Mod Configuration
unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.position:
Horizontal position relative to the screen (0 = left, 1 = right)
Any value works, e.g. 0.1 = 10% of the screen width from the left edge.

Vertical position relative to the screen (0 = top, 1 = bottom)
Any value works, e.g. 0.1 = 10% of the screen height from the top edge.

Absolute horizontal position offset.
This is added after the relative position has been calculated.
Negative values shift to the left, positive values shift to the right.

Absolute vertical position offset.
This is added after the relative position has been calculated.
Negative values shift upwards, positive values shift downwards.

Horizontal alignment.
0: left-aligned, 0.5: centered, 1: right-aligned.
Any value between 0 and 1 works.

Vertical alignment.
0: top-aligned, 0.5: centered, 1: bottom-aligned.
Any value between 0 and 1 works.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.option.o:
Render tridents using the item textures.
Requires the Monumenta resource pack to look good.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.option.l:
Lowers helmets and player heads worn by villagers
to fit with the model used in the Monumenta RP.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.option.f:
Changes the Firmament and Doorway from Eternity to place prismarine/blackstone
instead of a Shulker box for faster placement.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.option.c: Disable ChestSort (double right click) in the player inventory
Disable ChestSort (double right click) in the Ender Chest
Disable ChestSort (double right click) in every other type of inventory
unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.option.r: Display cooldowns of special items like Tesseracts.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.option.h:
HUD elements can be reordered by opening the chat and then dragging them around with the mouse while holding ctrl.
Alternatively, press the 'HUD Edit Screen' button to edit the HUD (assign this key in the Minecraft settings).

Global switch to turn all custom HUD elements on or off.
When enabled, the options below are used.
When disabled, the vanilla HUD is shown.

Replace status bars (health, hunger, air) with custom bars.
Also removes the armor bar without replacement.

Speed of the regeneration display, in pixels per second.
Set to 0 to disable.

Vertical offset of the textual health display.
Negative values move upwards, positive values downwards.
When enabled, the health bar is mirrored so it fills from the right.
When enabled, the hunger bar is mirrored so it fills from the right.
When enabled, the breath bar is mirrored so it fills from the right.
Hide breath bar with water breathing
When enabled, the breath bar is hidden while you have water breathing, as long as it is full, even underwater.
Replace mount health bar with a custom bar.

Vertical offset of the textual mount health display.
Negative values move upwards, positive values downwards.
When enabled, the mount health bar is mirrored so it fills from the right.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.option.a:
Abilities can be reordered by opening the chat and then dragging them around with the mouse.
To move the whole ability display instead, hold ctrl while clicking & dragging.
Alternatively, press the 'HUD Edit Screen' button to move abilities (assign this key in the Minecraft settings).
Show abilities
Show the ability display with cooldowns and current stacks/charges.
Show cooldown as text
Shows the cooldown as a counter in seconds as well.
Hide ability messages

Hides the usual ability-related messages from the server.
Hides messages like 'Mana Lance is now off cooldown!' and 'Sharpshooter Stacks: 1'.
This setting has no effect if 'Show abilities' is disabled.
Show in front of chat unless chat is open

When this option is enabled, the abilities will be displayed in front of chat messages
as long as the chat is not currently open.
This will draw them in front of the overlay messages as well since those are behind the chat.
Tooltips

Show tooltips when hovering over an ability while the chat is open.
Currently only displays the ability's name.
Display position:
Preset (applies on save & exit)

Applies a preset for the ability display.
Custom: uses the values set below.
Above Hotbar: Puts the abilities centered above the hotbar (default).
Right of Hotbar: Puts abilities to the right of the hotbar.
Left side of Screen: Abilities are shown vertically at the left edge of the screen.
Right side of Screen: Abilities are shown vertically at the right edge of the screen.
Horizontal
Enable for horizontal display, disable for vertical display.
Position of the ability display
Raw positional values of the ability display for manual adjustment.
Miscellaneous options:
Off-Cooldown resize
Briefly enlarges abilities when they get off cooldown.
Off-Cooldown flash intensity

Intensity of the flash when an ability gets off cooldown.
Set to 0% to disable the flash.
Off-Cooldown sound volume

Volume of the sound played when an ability gets off cooldown.
Set to 0% to disable the sound.
Off-Cooldown sound pitch min

Pitch of the off-cooldown sound for the first ability.
Abilities in-between get a pitch in-between these values.
Off-Cooldown sound pitch max

Pitch of the off-cooldown sound for the last ability.
Abilities in-between get a pitch in-between these values.
Icon size

Size of the ability icons.
The default of 32 will show icons in the same resolution as the rest of the GUI.
Icon gap

Gap between ability icons.
Can be negative to move icons closer together.
Text color
Color of the cooldown and stacks/charges counters.
Text offset

Offset of cooldown and charge counters from the edges of the icons.
Positive to move inwards, negative to move outwards.
Render in ascending order

Render from left/top to right/bottom or vice versa.
Only really matters if the icon gap is negative.
When enabled, icons to the right/bottom will be on top if they overlap, or vice versa if disabled.
Show only abilities currently on cooldown
Hides abilities not currently on cooldown.
Always show abilities with stacks

Shows abilities with stacks or changes regardless of the previous setting.
When disabled, only completely passive abilities without a cooldown are shown.
Condense abilities
When abilities are hidden due to being on cooldown, move abilities together to prevent gaps.
Show passive abilities with modes

A few passive abilities have different modes.
Enable this to see icons for these abilities showing which mode they're in.
